#!/bin/bash
# Enhanced Database Backup Tool Installation mit SSL-Debugging

set -e

declare -r DIR="/mnt/server"
declare -r APP_DIR="${DIR}/db-backup-tool"

# Fest definiertes Repository
REPO_URL="https://github.com/brandy2307/db-backup-tool.git"
REPO_BRANCH="main"

echo "================================================="
echo "DB BACKUP TOOL INSTALLATION (ENHANCED SSL DEBUG)"
echo "================================================="
echo "Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "Target: ${APP_DIR}"
echo "Features: Enhanced SSL-Debugging + Docker-Fixed"
echo "================================================="

# System Dependencies
echo "[1/8] Installing system dependencies..."
apt update
apt install -y wget curl gnupg2 software-properties-common git openssl ca-certificates lsb-release netstat-nat

# Node.js
echo "[2/8] Installing Node.js 18..."
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash -
apt install -y nodejs

# Database Tools
echo "[3/8] Installing database tools..."
apt install -y mysql-client || echo "MySQL client optional"
apt install -y postgresql-client || echo "PostgreSQL client optional"
apt install -y mongodb-database-tools || echo "MongoDB tools optional"

# SSL Tools (erweitert f√ºr Debugging)
echo "[4/8] Installing enhanced SSL tools..."
apt install -y certbot python3-certbot-nginx python3-certbot-apache || echo "Certbot installation failed - will use self-signed"
apt install -y openssl ca-certificates
apt install -y net-tools dnsutils || echo "Network tools optional"

# Git Setup
echo "[5/8] Configuring Git..."
git config --global init.defaultBranch main
git config --global user.name "DB Backup Tool"
git config --global user.email "backup@localhost"

# Repository Clone
echo "[6/8] Cloning repository..."
cd "${DIR}"
rm -rf "${APP_DIR}" 2>/dev/null || true
git clone -b "${REPO_BRANCH}" "${REPO_URL}" "${APP_DIR}"
cd "${APP_DIR}"

# Dependencies
echo "[7/8] Installing dependencies..."
npm cache clean --force
npm install --production --no-audit --no-fund

# Directory Setup
echo "Creating directories..."
mkdir -p backups logs config public ssl
chmod 700 ssl
chmod 755 backups logs config public

n[req]
distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
req_extensions = v3_req
prompt = no
x509_extensions = v3_ca

[req_distinguished_name]
C = DE
ST = NRW
L = Docker
O = DB Backup Tool Enhanced
CN = DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER

[v3_req]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
keyUsage = nonRepudiation, digitalSignature, keyEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage = serverAuth, clientAuth
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[v3_ca]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
keyUsage = nonRepudiation, digitalSignature, keyEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage = serverAuth, clientAuth
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[alt_names]
DNS.1 = DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER
DNS.2 = localhost
DNS.3 = *.DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER
IP.1 = 127.0.0.1
IP.2 = ::1
CONFEOF
    
    # Domain in Config einsetzen
    sed -i "s/DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER/${SSL_DOMAIN}/g" ssl/openssl.cnf
    
    if [ "$DEBUG" = "true" ]; then
        log_debug "OpenSSL Config erstellt:"
        cat ssl/openssl.cnf | while read line; do
            log_debug "Config: $line"
        done
    fi
    
    # Zertifikat erstellen mit Enhanced KeyUsage
    log_info "F√ºhre OpenSSL-Befehl aus..."
    if openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:${SSL_KEY_SIZE} \
        -keyout ssl/privkey.pem \
        -out ssl/fullchain.pem \
        -days ${SSL_CERT_VALIDITY} \
        -nodes \
        -config ssl/openssl.cnf \
        -extensions v3_ca 2>&1 | while read line; do
            log_debug "OpenSSL: $line"
        done; then
        log_info "‚úÖ OpenSSL-Befehl erfolgreich"
    else
        log_error "‚ùå OpenSSL-Befehl fehlgeschlagen"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    rm -f ssl/openssl.cnf
    
    # Validierung
    if openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -text -noout | grep -q "digitalSignature"; then
        log_info "‚úÖ Enhanced SSL-Zertifikat mit korrekter KeyUsage erstellt"
        log_info "üåê Browser-Kompatibilit√§t: ERR_SSL_KEY_USAGE_INCOMPATIBLE behoben"
    else
        log_error "‚ö†Ô∏è KeyUsage m√∂glicherweise nicht optimal"
    fi
    
elif [ "${SSL_METHOD}" = "letsencrypt" ]; then
    log_info "üåê Let's Encrypt Setup mit Debug-Informationen..."
    
    # Erweiterte Validierung f√ºr Let's Encrypt
    if [ "$SSL_DOMAIN" = "localhost" ] || [[ "$SSL_DOMAIN" =~ ^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$ ]]; then
        log_error "‚ùå Let's Encrypt funktioniert nicht mit localhost/IP-Adressen"
        log_error "Domain: $SSL_DOMAIN ist nicht f√ºr Let's Encrypt geeignet"
        log_error "Verwende eine echte Domain oder w√§hle 'selfsigned'"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # DNS-Validierung
    if command -v nslookup >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        log_info "Pr√ºfe DNS-Aufl√∂sung f√ºr $SSL_DOMAIN..."
        if ! nslookup "$SSL_DOMAIN" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            log_error "‚ùå DNS-Aufl√∂sung fehlgeschlagen f√ºr $SSL_DOMAIN"
            log_error "Let's Encrypt ben√∂tigt eine √∂ffentlich aufl√∂sbare Domain"
            if [ "$FORCE_DOMAIN_VALIDATION" != "true" ]; then
                log_error "Setze FORCE_DOMAIN_VALIDATION=true um fortzufahren"
                exit 1
            fi
        else
            log_info "‚úÖ DNS-Aufl√∂sung erfolgreich"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Port-Verf√ºgbarkeit pr√ºfen
    log_info "Pr√ºfe Port $LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT f√ºr Let's Encrypt..."
    if command -v netstat >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        if netstat -tlnp 2>/dev/null | grep -q ":$LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT "; then
            log_error "‚ùå Port $LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT ist belegt"
            log_error "Let's Encrypt ben√∂tigt Port $LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT"
            exit 1
        else
            log_info "‚úÖ Port $LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT ist verf√ºgbar"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Certbot Installation pr√ºfen
    if ! command -v certbot >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        log_error "‚ùå Certbot nicht gefunden"
        log_error "Let's Encrypt ben√∂tigt Certbot"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log_info "F√ºhre Certbot aus..."
    certbot certonly \
        --standalone \
        --non-interactive \
        --agree-tos \
        --email "${SSL_EMAIL}" \
        --domains "${SSL_DOMAIN}" \
        --key-type rsa \
        --rsa-key-size ${SSL_KEY_SIZE} \
        --preferred-challenges http \
        --http-01-port ${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT} 2>&1 | while read line; do
            log_debug "Certbot: $line"
            if echo "$line" | grep -E "(Successfully|Congratulations)" >/dev/null; then
                log_info "$line"
            elif echo "$line" | grep -E "(Error|Failed)" >/dev/null; then
                log_error "$line"
            fi
        done
    
    # Zertifikate kopieren
    if [ -d "/etc/letsencrypt/live/${SSL_DOMAIN}" ]; then
        cp "/etc/letsencrypt/live/${SSL_DOMAIN}/fullchain.pem" ssl/fullchain.pem
        cp "/etc/letsencrypt/live/${SSL_DOMAIN}/privkey.pem" ssl/privkey.pem
        log_info "‚úÖ Let's Encrypt Zertifikat erfolgreich kopiert"
    else
        log_error "‚ùå Let's Encrypt Zertifikat-Verzeichnis nicht gefunden"
        exit 1
    fi
    
elif [ "${SSL_METHOD}" = "cloudflare" ]; then
    log_info "‚òÅÔ∏è Cloudflare Origin Certificate Setup..."
    
    if [ -z "${CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN}" ]; then
        log_error "‚ùå CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN ist erforderlich"
        log_error "Setze die Umgebungsvariable CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log_debug "Cloudflare Token verf√ºgbar (${#CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN} Zeichen)"
    
    # Hier w√ºrde die vollst√§ndige Cloudflare-Implementierung stehen
    log_error "‚ùå Cloudflare-Setup in Docker noch nicht vollst√§ndig implementiert"
    log_error "Verwende 'selfsigned' als Alternative"
    exit 1
    
else
    log_error "‚ùå Unbekannte SSL-Methode: ${SSL_METHOD}"
    log_error "Unterst√ºtzte Methoden: selfsigned, letsencrypt, cloudflare"
    exit 1
fi

# Berechtigungen setzen
chmod 644 ssl/fullchain.pem 2>/dev/null || true
chmod 600 ssl/privkey.pem 2>/dev/null || true

# Finale Validierung
if openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -text -noout >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    log_info "‚úÖ SSL-Zertifikat erfolgreich validiert"
    
    if [ "$DEBUG" = "true" ]; then
        log_debug "Zertifikat-Details:"
        openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -subject -dates -noout 2>/dev/null | while read line; do
            log_debug "Cert: $line"
        done
    fi
    
    # KeyUsage-Check f√ºr Browser-Kompatibilit√§t
    if openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -text -noout | grep -q "digitalSignature"; then
        log_info "üåê Browser-Kompatibilit√§t: ‚úÖ ERR_SSL_KEY_USAGE_INCOMPATIBLE behoben"
    else
        log_error "‚ö†Ô∏è Browser-Kompatibilit√§t m√∂glicherweise eingeschr√§nkt"
    fi
else
    log_error "‚ùå SSL-Zertifikat ung√ºltig"
    exit 1
fi

log_info "üéâ Enhanced SSL-Setup abgeschlossen!"
SSLEOF

# SSL-Setup ausf√ºhrbar machen
chmod +x ./ssl-setup-simple.sh

# SSL-Setup ausf√ºhren wenn aktiviert
if [ "${SSL_SETUP_ON_START:-true}" = "true" ] && [ "${REQUIRE_HTTPS:-false}" = "true" ]; then
    echo "üîê F√ºhre Enhanced SSL-Setup mit vollst√§ndigem Debugging aus..."
    
    # Debug-Variablen f√ºr SSL-Setup setzen
    export SSL_DEBUG="${SSL_DEBUG:-false}"
    export SSL_VERBOSE="${SSL_VERBOSE:-false}"
    export LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT="${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT:-80}"
    export FORCE_DOMAIN_VALIDATION="${FORCE_DOMAIN_VALIDATION:-false}"
    
    echo "üîß SSL-Setup Konfiguration:"
    echo "   SSL_METHOD: ${SSL_METHOD}"
    echo "   SSL_DOMAIN: ${SSL_DOMAIN}"
    echo "   SSL_EMAIL: ${SSL_EMAIL}"
    echo "   SSL_DEBUG: ${SSL_DEBUG}"
    echo "   SSL_VERBOSE: ${SSL_VERBOSE}"
    echo "   LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT: ${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT}"
    echo "   FORCE_DOMAIN_VALIDATION: ${FORCE_DOMAIN_VALIDATION}"
    echo ""
    
    if ./ssl-setup-simple.sh; then
        echo "‚úÖ Enhanced SSL-Setup erfolgreich"
        if [ -f "ssl/fullchain.pem" ] && [ -f "ssl/privkey.pem" ]; then
            echo "üîê HTTPS-Zertifikate erstellt"
            echo "üåê Enhanced Browser-Kompatibilit√§t aktiviert"
            echo "üîç Debug-Logs verf√ºgbar in: ssl/ssl-debug.log"
            
            # Zertifikat-Details anzeigen wenn Debug aktiv
            if [ "${SSL_DEBUG}" = "true" ]; then
                echo ""
                echo "üìã ZERTIFIKAT-ZUSAMMENFASSUNG:"
                cert_subject=$(openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -subject -noout 2>/dev/null | sed 's/subject=//' || echo "Unbekannt")
                cert_expiry=$(openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -enddate -noout 2>/dev/null | sed 's/notAfter=//' || echo "Unbekannt")
                cert_issuer=$(openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -issuer -noout 2>/dev/null | sed 's/issuer=//' || echo "Unbekannt")
                echo "   Subject: $cert_subject"
                echo "   Issuer: $cert_issuer"
                echo "   L√§uft ab: $cert_expiry"
                
                # KeyUsage-Check
                if openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -text -noout | grep -q "digitalSignature"; then
                    echo "   KeyUsage: ‚úÖ Browser-kompatibel (digitalSignature, keyEncipherment)"
                    echo "   Status: ‚úÖ ERR_SSL_KEY_USAGE_INCOMPATIBLE behoben"
                else
                    echo "   KeyUsage: ‚ö†Ô∏è M√∂glicherweise eingeschr√§nkt"
                fi
                
                # Debug-Log Statistiken
                if [ -f "ssl/ssl-debug.log" ]; then
                    log_lines=$(wc -l < ssl/ssl-debug.log 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
                    log_size=$(stat -c%s ssl/ssl-debug.log 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
                    echo "   Debug-Log: $log_lines Zeilen, $log_size Bytes"
                fi
            fi
        fi
    else
        ssl_exit_code=$?
        echo "‚ö†Ô∏è SSL-Setup fehlgeschlagen (Exit Code: $ssl_exit_code)"
        echo "üîç Pr√ºfe ssl/ssl-debug.log f√ºr Details"
        
        # Bei Debugging: Letzte Log-Zeilen anzeigen
        if [ "${SSL_DEBUG}" = "true" ] && [ -f "ssl/ssl-debug.log" ]; then
            echo ""
            echo "üìã LETZTE DEBUG-LOG EINTR√ÑGE:"
            tail -10 ssl/ssl-debug.log 2>/dev/null || echo "Keine Debug-Logs verf√ºgbar"
        fi
        
        echo ""
        echo "üí° TROUBLESHOOTING-HINWEISE:"
        if [ "${SSL_METHOD}" = "letsencrypt" ]; then
            echo "   Let's Encrypt Probleme:"
            echo "   ‚Ä¢ Domain muss √∂ffentlich erreichbar sein: ${SSL_DOMAIN}"
            echo "   ‚Ä¢ Port ${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT} muss verf√ºgbar sein"
            echo "   ‚Ä¢ DNS-Aufl√∂sung muss funktionieren"
            echo "   ‚Ä¢ Verwende SSL_METHOD=selfsigned f√ºr localhost/private Domains"
        fi
        echo "   ‚Ä¢ Setze SSL_DEBUG=true f√ºr detaillierte Logs"
        echo "   ‚Ä¢ Pr√ºfe Container-Logs nach SSL-Setup Fehlern"
        echo "   ‚Ä¢ Verwende Self-Signed f√ºr interne/Test-Umgebungen"
    fi
else
    echo "‚ÑπÔ∏è Enhanced SSL-Setup √ºbersprungen"
    echo "   SSL_SETUP_ON_START: ${SSL_SETUP_ON_START:-true}"
    echo "   REQUIRE_HTTPS: ${REQUIRE_HTTPS:-false}"
    if [ "${REQUIRE_HTTPS:-false}" = "false" ]; then
        echo "   üí° Setze REQUIRE_HTTPS=true um SSL zu aktivieren"
    fi
fi

# Finale Berechtigungen
chmod 755 .
chmod 644 *.json *.js *.md 2>/dev/null || true
chmod +x *.sh 2>/dev/null || true

# Grundlegende Dateien erstellen
touch logs/security.log
echo "[]" > backups/schedules.json 2>/dev/null || true
echo "* text=auto" > .gitattributes 2>/dev/null || true

# Validierung
echo "Validiere Installation..."
if node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8'))" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "‚úÖ package.json g√ºltig"
else
    echo "‚ùå package.json ung√ºltig"
    exit 1
fi

echo "================================================="
echo "üéâ ENHANCED INSTALLATION ERFOLGREICH!"
echo "================================================="
echo "‚úÖ Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "‚úÖ Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "‚úÖ Node.js: $(node --version 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unknown')"
echo "‚úÖ NPM: $(npm --version 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unknown')"
echo "‚úÖ Enhanced SSL: Mit erweiterten Debugging"
echo "‚úÖ Browser Fix: ERR_SSL_KEY_USAGE_INCOMPATIBLE behoben"
echo "‚úÖ Debug-Support: SSL_DEBUG, SSL_VERBOSE verf√ºgbar"
echo "‚úÖ Port-Konfiguration: LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT konfigurierbar"

if [ -f "ssl/fullchain.pem" ] && [ -f "ssl/privkey.pem" ]; then
    echo "üîê SSL Status: Zertifikate verf√ºgbar"
else
    echo "‚ÑπÔ∏è SSL Status: Wird beim ersten Start erstellt"
fi

echo "================================================="
echo "üöÄ SERVER BEREIT MIT ENHANCED SSL-DEBUGGING!"
echo "üîß Erweiterte SSL-Konfiguration √ºber ENV-Variablen"
echo "üîç Debug-Logs: ssl/ssl-debug.log"
echo "================================================="
